 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבַץ‎</span> **verb** ==stretch oneself out, lie down, lie stretched out== (Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rabâƒu***</u></abbr>, ***lie, dwell***; <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***rubƒu***</u></abbr> (in word-lists), ***stall***, also ***womb*** (compare II. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רבע‎</span> above); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***lie down, on the breast, stretch oneself out***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Sabean <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מרבצֿן‎</span> [[BDB#CIS|CIS]]<sup>iv. no. 5, 2</sup>; [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְבַע‎</span> ***lie stretched out***, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***recline at meals***, [[BDB#Schw|Schw]]<sup>Idioticon 87</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Gen.49.9|Gen 49:9]], 3 feminine singular consecutive <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְרָֽבְצָה‎</span> [[Deut.29.19|Deut 29:19]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָבָ֑צָה‎</span> [[Ezek.19.2|Ezek 19:2]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְבָּ֑ץ‎</span> [[Isa.11.6|Isa 11:6]]; [[Isa.27.10|Isa 27:10]] 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּרְבַּץ‎</span> [[Num.22.27|Num 22:27]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְבְּצוּ‎</span> [[Num.11.7|Num 11:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְבָּ֑צוּ‎</span> [[Num.14.30|Num 14:30]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִרְבָּצ֑וּן‎</span> [[Zeph.2.7|Zeph 2:7]]; [[Ps.104.22|Ps 104:22]] 3 feminine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּרְבַּצְנָה‎</span> [[Ezek.34.14|Ezek 34:14]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֵץ‎</span> [[Exod.23.5|Exod 23:5]] + 3 t.; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֶ֫צֶת‎</span> [[Gen.49.25|Gen 49:25]] + 2 t.; masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבְצֹים‎</span> [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]] — ***lie down, lie:*** of domestic animals, ass [[Exod.23.5|Exod 23:5]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; under heavy burden), [[Num.22.27|Num 22:27]] (Jeremiah; in obstructed path), [[Gen.49.14|Gen 49:14]] (at ease; poetic, in simile); sheep, in repose, [[Gen.29.2|Gen 29:2]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Isa.17.2|Isa 17:2]]; [[Zeph.2.14|Zeph 2:14]] figurative of people [[Ezek.34.14|Ezek 34:14]] calf. in repose [[Isa.27.10|Isa 27:10]]: of wild beasts, lion, in lair, [[Gen.49.9|Gen 49:9]] (poem in [[BDB#J|J]]; figurative), [[Ps.104.22|Ps 104:22]] = make lair, abode [[Ezek.19.2|Ezek 19:2]] (figurative), so of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צִיִּים‎</span> [[Isa.13.21|Isa 13:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנֵין‎</span> [[Ezek.29.3|Ezek 29:3]] (figurative); leopard (with kid) [[Isa.11.6|Isa 11:6]], compare v[[Isa.11.7|Isa 11:7]] = brood, of mother-bird [[Deut.22.6|Deut 22:6]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלהָֿאֶפְרֹחִים‎</span>); of man, in repose [[Isa.14.30|Isa 14:30]]; [[Job.11.19|Job 11:19]], compare [[Zeph.2.7|Zeph 2:7]]; [[Zeph.3.13|Zeph 3:13]] (figurative of flock perhaps implied, compare [[Ezek.34.14|Ezek 34:14]] above); of the deep, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֹבֶצֶת תָּ֑חַת‎</span> [[Gen.49.25|Gen 49:25]]; [[Deut.33.13|Deut 33:13]] figurative of curse [[Deut.29.19|Deut 29:19]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person); of sin, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַפֶּתַח חַטָאת רֹבֵץ‎</span> [[Gen.4.7|Gen 4:7]] ***at the door sin makes its lair.*** **Hiph\`il** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יַרְבִּיצֵנִי‎</span> [[Ps.23.2|Ps 23:2]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּרְבִּיץ‎</span> [[Song.1.7|Song 1:7]], etc.; ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְבִּיץ‎</span> [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]]l, plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַרְבִּצִים‎</span> [[Jer.33.12|Jer 33:12]] — ***cause to lie down***, or ***lie***, accusative of flock (for repose) [[Jer.33.12|Jer 33:12]], also (figurative) [[Ps.23.2|Ps 23:2]]; [[Ezek.34.15|Ezek 34:15]] accusative of flock omitted [[Isa.13.10|Isa 13:10]]; [[Song.1.7|Song 1:7]] of ***laying*** stones [[Isa.54.1|Isa 54:1]]l.
